alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys; San Francisco; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 27 at 8:25AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marin, northwestern Alameda, northwestern San Mateo, western Contra Costa, southeastern Sonoma, San Francisco and southeastern Napa Counties through 915 AM PST... At 825 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Boyes Hot Springs to 18 miles southwest of Stinson Beach. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Francisco, Oakland, Concord, Vallejo, Berkeley, Richmond, Daly City, San Leandro, Napa, Alameda, San Ramon, Walnut Creek, South San Francisco, Pittsburg, Petaluma, San Rafael, Novato, Danville, Pacifica and Martinez. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
